posts.name: Michelle
posts.cooked:
We‚Äôre releasing the Signal 7.74 beta soon. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

‚òÖ Added some context menu options to chats during search
‚òÖ More HDR weird color fixes

Complete list of new commits since 7.73.2:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.73.2‚Ä¶main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.73 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.74.0 (164800)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

48 new commits since 7.73.2:

Show commits

  • Avoid showing KT for note to self. [1]

  • Add tests for MemberLabelViewModel. [2]

  • Reshape entry point for V3 media screens. [3]

  • Clean up system for blessed sticker packs. [4]

  • Fix back button intermittently not working in conversation view. [5]

  • Fix benchmark tests. [6]

  • Add audio-indicator slot to use for single-remote-participant calls. [7]

  • Remove app module SignalTheme. [8]

  • Add comment to clarify intentional fall-through in DeviceTransferSetUpFragment switch statement. [9]

    Resolves signalapp/Signal-Android##14437

  • Fix GroupTable.memberLabel() to return null for blank labels. [10]

  • Move fragments to core UI. [11]

  • Ensure spans are accounted for when measuring text. [12]

  • Display member label on recipient details sheet. [13]

  • Refactor and improve video demo app. [14]

  • Move additional fragments to core UI. [15]

  • Adjust strings. [16]

  • Update video demo app to minSdk 26. [17]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.87.1 [18]

  • Add new sticker packs. [19]

    • My Daily Life 2
    • Rocky Talk
    • Cozy Season
    • Chug the Mouse
    • Croco's Feelings as blessed sticker packs

  • Show linked deviceId's for internal users. [20]

  • Include battery info debuglog. [21]

  • Ensure lint configuration is applied to all modules. [22]

  • Fix for some HDR transcoding issues. [23]

  • Fix donation learn more sheet icon colors. [24]

  • Remove proto files from APK. [25]

  • Show member labels in conversation settings. [26]

  • Fix video scrubber contrast with HDR video. [27]

  • Split performance benchmark and baseline profile into separate modules. [28]

  • Add description to edit member label screen. [29]

  • Fix position of clearable text field remaining characters count. [30]

  • Add group member labels to conversation items. [31]

  • Allow some context menu actions in search. [32]

  • Show whose safety number changed in group chat summaries. [33]

  • Fix bug where image wasn't showing after send. [34]

  • Fix the message edited label not always appearing. [35]

    Closes signalapp/Signal-Android#14582

  • Make pinned chat limit remote configurable. [36]

  • Move the rest of the permissions classes. [37]

  • Fix gif and stickers buttons disappearing after exiting edit. [38]

  • Adjust strings. [39]

  • Fix sticker grid sometimes getting stuck on 2 columns. [40]

  • Fix group updates from others showing before messages made before the update. [41]

  • Move education sheet to safety numbers screen. [42]

  • Fix beta label width. [43]

  • Show member labels in quotes. [44]

  • Rotate receive member labels flag. [45]

  • Support member labels in backups. [46]

  • Update translations and other static files. [47]

  • Bump version to 7.74.0 [48]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.73.2‚Ä¶v7.74.0

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn‚Äôt).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.73.2:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from ‚ÄúUpdated language translations‚Äù and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.73.2 so far here.

mtang-signal:

posts.name: Michelle
posts.cooked: Haha - yes that‚Äôll make it easier to debug :'). Will fix soon.

posts.name: Clayton Burns
posts.cooked:
Here‚Äôs a weird one. I noticed that when I am typing, my keyboard resets ever few seconds, resulting in missed key presses and getting kicked out of the symbols menu. It only seems to happen in Signal.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.74.0/1a68be45f34b5a976722a02830de3e8ad0ad7761e244245b1544e053156d066b

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
clayb91:

I noticed that when I am typing, my keyboard resets ever few seconds, resulting in missed key presses and getting kicked out of the symbols menu.

Can you tell me more about your linked devices? Desktop instance, iPad, signal-cli? I‚Äôm seeing a ton of sync traffic in your logs.

posts.name: Clayton Burns
posts.cooked: I have 4 linked devices, two Signal Desktop instances, and two Molly instances on other Android devices. All are online all the time.

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
clayb91:

and two Molly instances on other Android devices

Could be good to get those logs. My guess is that something is up with the syncing logic on molly that‚Äôs causing it to get stuck in a storage service loop, where they‚Äôre fighting over syncing, and those frequent syncs are causing stutters do to data refreshing in response to changes (we can improve that, but we shouldn‚Äôt be syncing like this either).

The reason I suspect molly is because we‚Äôre building out linked android support, and there‚Äôs some known-but-not-fixed syncing bugs like this in the android app when it‚Äôs a linked device

You could also try just unlinking+relinking them.

link_counts.title: Allow Android / iOS devices (e.g. tablets, but also phones) to be linked to the primary device, i.e. used as secondary device like the Desktop app

links.title: Allow for more than 4 pinned chats
Allow Android / iOS devices (e.g. tablets, but also phones) to be linked to the primary device, i.e. used as secondary device like the Desktop app
